knimeNode.name: WKT To Geo Data Cell
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a string column with a valid Well-known text (WKT) string into the corresponding geospatial cell.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a string column with a valid Well-known text (WKT) string into the corresponding geospatial cell.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: String column with a valid Well-known text (WKT) string that should be converted into a geospatial cell.
The coordinate reference system to use in WKT-CRS format.
